name: BELLA 3 Qt Touchscreen Air Fryer Oven and 5-in-1 Multicooker with Removable NonstickDishwasher Safe Crisping Tray and Basket, 1400 Watt Heating System, Matte Blue
about_this_item: EFFORTLESS COOKING AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Say goodbye to complicated buttons and hello to delicious, hassle-free dishes! Our small air fryers boast a digital touchscreen, which make cooking easy and fun. Enjoy creating delicious, gourmet meals in minutes

PERFECT FOR SMALL GATHERINGS: With a capacity of up to 2.5 pounds of food, this mini air fryer can feed up to 2-4 people. From crispy french fries and fish sticks to mouthwatering chicken thighs and wings, it's a crowd-pleaser for any occasion

UNLEASH YOUR CULINARY CREATIVITY: Our 5-IN-1 Multi-Cooker lets you Air Fry, Broil, Bake, Roast, or Reheat meals with ease. Powered by a 1400 watt heating element and Circular Heat Technology, the deep fryer ensure even cooking and always-crispy foods

INDULGE IN HEALTHY DELIGHTS: Enjoy guilt-free meals with 88% less fat and 65% fewer calories than typical fast food restaurants. The PFOA-free Nonstick basket and crisping tray are removable and dishwasher safe, making cleanup of the mini oven a breeze

COMPACT SIZE: Thanks to its compact size, our electric fryer fits easily on any countertop, saving you valuable space without sacrificing performance. These kitchen appliances are absolute new house essentials and a must-have for your college dorm

title: Perfect size and great look!
content: This is my first air fryer and it's the best thing since sliced bread!  I can't imagine how much electricity I'm saving with this over my electric stove.  And it doesn't heat my whole house up in the summer like the stove does.  And food tastes delicious!  It cooks almost as fast as my microwave!  It cooks food in only a quarter of the time as a conventional stove.  And here's a tip for first timers:  Don't follow package cooking directions with this or you'll burn your food.  If the package directions say to cook at 400 degrees for 20 minutes for conventional ovens, try just cooking your item for 5 minutes.  After 5 minutes, you can check it and if you want to cook it for another minute or 2 you can.  That's not a flaw, it's a benefit!  This air fryer cooks fast.  I'll never be without one again.  I love it!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022

title: My first Air Fryer
content: It‚Äôs a good size for 1-2 people. It‚Äôs easy to program and easy to clean. However it also has two (IMO) serious design flaws. One: no sound when time is up, so be sure to set a separate timer. Two: there‚Äôs a hole in middle of the rack/tray so it can be lifted out for cleaning. Unfortunately, the hole also lets food fall through. It then either burns, sits in grease, or gets cold. Wasteful and just poor design.
